title: Study Angle
content:
Angle is a tool on financial charts for measuring the angle of trends, helping to assess the rate of price change and the strength of the trend.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Visualization

NameDescription
Line Specifies settings for the color, style, and width of the displayed lines.

Properties
NameDescription
Color
Line style
Options:
  • Solid
  • Dash
  • Dot
  • Dash Dot
  • Dash Dot Dot
Width
Font Specifies various settings for the font.
Font Color Sets the color of the label text.

Behind the chart

NameDescription
Behind the chart Determines the order in which the object and chart candles are displayed: if true, the object is drawn under the candles; if false, candles are drawn under the object.
